official_title: To increase the irrigable acreage for the San Angelo Federal reclamation project, Texas, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to increase from 10,000 to 15,000 the irrigable acreage limit of the San Angelo Federal reclamation project, Texas, for lands in Tom Green County.

titles.title: To increase the irrigable acreage for the San Angelo Federal reclamation project, Texas, and for other purposes.
